head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HERRICK, CLARENCE JOEL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HERRICK, CLARENCE JOEL

block.p: HERRICK--Clarence Joel, 99 of Redding,CT, on December 24th, 2006. A brilliant copywriter and Art Director's Club honoree. Founder of own agency, C.J. Herrick Associates. Predeceased by wife, Eleanor. Survived by brother, Joel Herrick of Hull, MA; children, Neil and Jane; grandchildren, Trevor, Robin and Catherine; great-granddaughter, Francesca.
